original: @#/_/mgon po dmar po'i tshhe sgrub/
analyzed: @#/_/mgon po dmar po'i tshhe sgrub/
translated: The Red Protector's Wealth Practice

original: @/_phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las mgon po dmar po'i tshhe bsgrub bzhugs
analyzed: @/_phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las mgon po dmar po'i tshhe bsgrub bzhugs
translated: From the Dharma Cycle of the Six-Armed Wisdom Protector, the Red Protector's Wealth Practice

original: sto/_/_@@##/_/na mo gu ru/_mgon po dmar po'i tshhe bsgrub kyi zhal gdams ni/
analyzed: sto/_/_@@##/_/na mo gu ru/_mgon po dmar po'i tshhe bsgrub kyi zhal gdams ni/
translated: The instruction for the Red Protector's Wealth Practice is as follows:

original: bdag bskyed gang mos su bskyed pa'i mdun du chos 'byung dmar po gnyis rtshegs/
analyzed: bdag bskyed gang mos su bskyed pa'i mdun du chos 'byung dmar po gnyis rtshegs/
translated: In front of the self-generation, which is generated in any way one likes, are two red source of phenomena stacked one upon the other.

original: de'i phyir gzhal yas khang gru bzhi 'khyams phyogs mtshhon dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa/_de'i dbus su g+ham dmar po las tshhogs bdag dmar po/_de'i
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhal yas khang gru bzhi 'khyams phyogs mtshhon dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa/_de'i dbus su g+ham dmar po las tshhogs bdag dmar po/_de'i
translated: Outside of that is a square celestial mansion with four doors, together with the eight charnel grounds in the four directions and four corners. In the center of that is a red gham, from which arises red Gaṇapati.🔽Above him is a dark-red hūṃ, from which light rays radiate,

original: steng du hum dmar nag_/de las 'od zer 'phros/_gdug pa can thams cad
analyzed: steng du hum dmar nag_/de las 'od zer 'phros/_gdug pa can thams cad
translated: cutting through all evil ones.

original: tshhar gcad/_tshhur 'dus hum la thim/_hum mer gyis zhu ba las/_yid bzhin🔽nor bu'i mgon po sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag drug pa/_zhabs gnyis
analyzed: tshhar gcad/_tshhur 'dus hum la thim/_hum mer gyis zhu ba las/_yid bzhin nor bu'i mgon po sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag drug pa/_zhabs gnyis
translated: The light is gathered back and dissolves into the hūṃ, which completely melts into light and arises as the wish-fulfilling🔽jewel protector, red in color, with one face and six arms.🔽His two feet are in the posture of a dancing hero.🔽His first two left hands hold a flaying knife and skull cup,

original: gyad kyi dor thabs su bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yon dang po gnyis gri thod bar pa
analyzed: gyad kyi dor thabs su bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yon dang po gnyis gri thod bar pa
translated: and the middle two hold a trident and khaṭvāṅga.

original: gnyis tshhe'i bum pa 'dzin pa/_tha ma gnyis da ma ru dang dril bu bsnams pa/🔽rgyan cha lugs gzhan rnams mthun pa/_gnod sbyin bzhi/_lha mo gtshang ris/🔽mgon po dmar po'i tshhe sgrub/
analyzed: gnyis tshhe'i bum pa 'dzin pa/_tha ma gnyis da ma ru dang dril bu bsnams pa/ rgyan cha lugs gzhan rnams mthun pa/_gnod sbyin bzhi/_lha mo gtshang ris/ mgon po dmar po'i tshhe sgrub/
translated: The first two hold vases, and the last two hold ḍamarus and bells.🔽The other ornaments and costumes are the same.

original: dam can rgya mtshho rnams bskyed la/_ye shes pa spyan drangs/_dam tshhig pa la
analyzed: dam can rgya mtshho rnams bskyed la/_ye shes pa spyan drangs/_dam tshhig pa la
translated: The four yakṣas and the four goddesses are generated, and the awareness beings are invoked and dissolved into the commitment beings.

original: stim/_gsol ba gdab/_yig brgya bzlas/_bshags pa bya/_de nas
analyzed: stim/_gsol ba gdab/_yig brgya bzlas/_bshags pa bya/_de nas
translated: Make supplications, recite the hundred-syllable mantra, and perform confession.

original: mgon po'i thugs kar hum dmar nag gi mtha' mar/_om badzra ma ha ka la k+shi rat+na
analyzed: mgon po'i thugs kar hum dmar nag gi mtha' mar/_om badzra ma ha ka la k+shi rat+na
translated: Then, visualize a dark red hūṃ at Protector’s heart surrounded by oṃ vajra mahākāla kṣi raṭ

original: gu ru hum ces pas bskor ba la dmigs la nyer gcig bzlas/_bsnyen pa gzhan
analyzed: gu ru hum ces pas bskor ba la dmigs la nyer gcig bzlas/_bsnyen pa gzhan
translated: na guru hūṃ. Recite that twenty-one times.

original: rnams kyang bya/_sku gsung thugs kyi gsol ba gdab bo/
analyzed: rnams kyang bya/_sku gsung thugs kyi gsol ba gdab bo/
translated: Also do the other recitations and make supplications to the awakened body, speech, and mind.

original: slob ma gzhug pa ni/_sngon 'gro rnams tshhar ba dang /_dngos gzhi ni
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa ni/_sngon 'gro rnams tshhar ba dang /_dngos gzhi ni
translated: Admit the disciples.

original: man+dal dbus su mgon po gong bzhin gsal gdab/_mgon po'i spyi bor mi
analyzed: man+dal dbus su mgon po gong bzhin gsal gdab/_mgon po'i spyi bor mi
translated: After performing the preliminaries, in the main practice, visualize Protector in the center of the mandala as before.🔽Visualize Maṇḍala Goddess on Protector’s head.

original: bskyod pa sngo skya/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa bsgom/
analyzed: bskyod pa sngo skya/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa bsgom/
translated: He is blue-green in color, with one face and two hands holding a vajra and a bell.

original: de'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros/_rgyud pa'i bla ma spyan drangs bstim/_mi
analyzed: de'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros/_rgyud pa'i bla ma spyan drangs bstim/_mi
translated: Light radiates from his heart, invoking the lineage gurus, who dissolve into him.

original: bskyod pa yang mgon po la bstim/_dbyer med du bsam/_de nas mgon
analyzed: bskyod pa yang mgon po la bstim/_dbyer med du bsam/_de nas mgon
translated: Akṣobhya dissolves into Protector, and they are considered inseparable.

original: po'i dpral bar om dkar po/_mgrin par a dmar po/_thugs kar hu~mhum
analyzed: po'i dpral bar om dkar po/_mgrin par a dmar po/_thugs kar hu~mhum
translated: Then, at Protector’s forehead is a white oṃ, at his throat a red āḥ, and at his heart a red huṃ.

original: dmar po/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la bzhengs nas rang gi sngags kyi sgra dang bcas pas slob ma'i spyi bor byon/_lta sgom spyod pa snang stong zung 'jug tu ngo
analyzed: dmar po/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus la bzhengs nas rang gi sngags kyi sgra dang bcas pas slob ma'i spyi bor byon/_lta sgom spyod pa snang stong zung 'jug tu ngo
translated: He rises up into the center of the maṇḍala and, with the sound of his mantra, arrives on the disciple’s head, introducing the view, meditation, and conduct of the union of appearance and emptiness.

original: sprad/_/ de nas mgon po'i dpral ba'i om dkar po las/_'od dkar po byung /
analyzed: sprad/_/ de nas mgon po'i dpral ba'i om dkar po las/_'od dkar po byung /
translated: Then, white light emerges from the white oṃ at Protector’s forehead,🔽dissolves into the disciple’s head, and the vase empowerment is obtained.

original: slob ma'i spyi bor thim bum dbang thob/_lus kyi dri ma dag_/mgrin pa'i a
analyzed: slob ma'i spyi bor thim bum dbang thob/_lus kyi dri ma dag_/mgrin pa'i a
translated: The taints of the body are purified.🔽Red light emerges from the red āḥ at his throat,

original: dmar po las/_'od dmar po byung /_gsang dbang thob/_ngag gi dri ma
analyzed: dmar po las/_'od dmar po byung /_gsang dbang thob/_ngag gi dri ma
translated: the secret empowerment is obtained, and the taints of speech are purified.

original: dag_/thugs ka'i hum dmar nag_/snying gar thim/_yid kyi dri ma dag_/🔽shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/_'od dkar dmar mthing gsum gcig tu
analyzed: dag_/thugs ka'i hum dmar nag_/snying gar thim/_yid kyi dri ma dag_/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/_'od dkar dmar mthing gsum gcig tu
translated: The red-black hūṃ at the heart dissolves into the heart, purifying mental stains.🔽One obtains the wisdom-awareness empowerment.

original: 'dres/_dbu ma'i nang du lte bar sleb/_tshhig dbang rin po che thob/_lus
analyzed: 'dres/_dbu ma'i nang du lte bar sleb/_tshhig dbang rin po che thob/_lus
translated: The white, red, and blue lights merge into one and reach the navel within the central channel, obtaining the precious secret empowerment.🔽One’s body, speech, and mind are purified.

original: ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma dag_/rang lus phyi dung dkar phyis pa lta bur bsam/
analyzed: ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma dag_/rang lus phyi dung dkar phyis pa lta bur bsam/
translated: Think that one’s body is like a polished white conch.

original: de nas mgon po rang dbang med par spyi bo na mar zhugs/_snying ga'i hum dang dkrug 'dres pas/_skad cig gi phyag drug par skrong bskyed/_de nas thugs
analyzed: de nas mgon po rang dbang med par spyi bo na mar zhugs/_snying ga'i hum dang dkrug 'dres pas/_skad cig gi phyag drug par skrong bskyed/_de nas thugs
translated: Then the lord enters one’s crown involuntarily and mixes with the hūṃ in the heart, instantly generating oneself as six-armed Caṇḍālī.

original: ka'i hum gi mtha' mar rtsha sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs pa gtad/_hum las
analyzed: ka'i hum gi mtha' mar rtsha sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs pa gtad/_hum las
translated: Then focus on the mantra string circling around the edge of the hūṃ in the heart.

original: 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros/_gdug pa can thams cad tshhar gcad/
analyzed: 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros/_gdug pa can thams cad tshhar gcad/
translated: Immeasurable light rays radiate from the hūṃ and annihilate all evildoers.

original: 'od zer tshhur 'dus hum la thim/_yang sngags las 'od zer 'phros/_rang gi
analyzed: 'od zer tshhur 'dus hum la thim/_yang sngags las 'od zer 'phros/_rang gi
translated: The light rays gather back and dissolve into the hūṃ.🔽Again light rays radiate from the mantra string, inviting immeasurable white hūṃ-marked vajras from the hearts of all the buddhas.

original: snying gi dkyil du 'od bde stong du me re gnas/_khams gsum skrag sa le mthong
analyzed: snying gi dkyil du 'od bde stong du me re gnas/_khams gsum skrag sa le mthong
translated: Think that one sees the three realms as a terrifying place.

original: bar bsam/_rang gis rang gi spyi bor bum pa gzhag_/bum pa las bdud
analyzed: bar bsam/_rang gis rang gi spyi bor bum pa gzhag_/bum pa las bdud
translated: Place the vase on one’s head.🔽From the vase, the three white, red, and black nectars descend.

original: rtshi dkar dmar gsum babs/_tshhe'i bum dbang thob/_mgrin par sleb/
analyzed: rtshi dkar dmar gsum babs/_tshhe'i bum dbang thob/_mgrin par sleb/
translated: One obtains the vase empowerment.🔽When they reach the throat,🔽one obtains the secret empowerment.

original: gsang dbang thob/_snying gar sleb shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/_rtsha
analyzed: gsang dbang thob/_snying gar sleb shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/_rtsha
translated: When they reach the heart, one obtains the wisdom-awareness empowerment.🔽The three channels and four cakras are filled with bliss and emptiness.

original: gsum 'khor lo bzhi bde stong gis khengs/_rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas par
analyzed: gsum 'khor lo bzhi bde stong gis khengs/_rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas par
translated: Meditate on abiding in the stage of a knowledge holder.

original: bsgom/_de dus lta sgom snang stong zung 'jug tu ngo sprad do/_/
analyzed: bsgom/_de dus lta sgom snang stong zung 'jug tu ngo sprad do/_/
translated: At that time, introduce the view and meditation as the union of appearance and emptiness.🔽The completion stage is as follows: The oṃ and āḥ at the forehead dissolve into the hūṃ.

original: rdzogs rim ni dpral ba'i om ah_la thim/_a hum la/_hum thig le la/
analyzed: rdzogs rim ni dpral ba'i om ah_la thim/_a hum la/_hum thig le la/
translated: The hūṃ dissolves into the bindu.🔽The bindu dissolves into the nada.🔽The nada dissolves into emptiness.🔽Rest in that.

original: thig le na da la/_na da stong pa nyid la lhan gyi bzhag_/sems phyag rgya chen🔽por bzhag go/_/dpal sha wa ri pa'i tshhe sgrub rig 'dzin khra /
analyzed: thig le na da la/_na da stong pa nyid la lhan gyi bzhag_/sems phyag rgya chen por bzhag go/_/dpal sha wa ri pa'i tshhe sgrub rig 'dzin khra /
translated: The mind rests in mahāmudrā.

original: brgyud pa ni/_rdo rje 'chang /_sha wa ri pa/_mi tri pa/_ra hu la/_khyung
analyzed: brgyud pa ni/_rdo rje 'chang /_sha wa ri pa/_mi tri pa/_ra hu la/_khyung
translated: The lineage of the Śrī Śavaripa’s Cakrasaṃvara Knowledge-Holder Wrath is as follows: Vajradhara, Śavaripa, Mitripa, Rāhula, Khyungpo Naljor, and so on.

original: po rnal 'byor/_la stod dkon mchog mkhar/_slob dpon byams pa/_slob
analyzed: po rnal 'byor/_la stod dkon mchog mkhar/_slob dpon byams pa/_slob
translated: the yogi of Po,🔽the master Jampa, the master Sanglo,

original: dpon sang blo/_mkhas mchog blo bzang /_sgrub po sangs rgyas dar/_byab
analyzed: dpon sang blo/_mkhas mchog blo bzang /_sgrub po sangs rgyas dar/_byab
translated: the supreme scholar Losang, the practitioner Sangye Dar,🔽the yogi of Yul,

original: dang /_yes rdor/_'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal po/_des bdag bla ma
analyzed: dang /_yes rdor/_'jam dbyangs nam mkha' rgyal po/_des bdag bla ma
translated: Jamyang Namkha Gyalpo,

original: rin chen la'o//_//
analyzed: rin chen la'o//_//
translated: and he to me, Rinchen.

original: mgon po dmar po'i tshhe sgrub
analyzed: mgon po dmar po'i tshhe sgrub
translated: The sadhana of the red protector
